availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. B. Cates (St. Louis, Missouri, cashier)

body.p: St. Louis, Missouri, cashier. Kentucky native. Cashier of Union Bank of Missouri in St. Louis, Missouri, in 1860. Banker in St. Louis in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Missouri, St. Louis County, St. Louis Ward 5, p. 256.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, MO, 1863.
"Joseph Byron Cates (1829-1877)," Find A Grave, Memorial 24489104, accessed October 18, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24489104.
